text: it's brilliant have viewers from outside

way of doing that usually the calculator
and all you need to do is type in our

and then add on 32 and that will give
you a degrees in Fahrenheit
in this case 392 it is a very simple
formula to follow whatever degrees
Celsius we're using times it by 1.8 then
add all 32 and that will give you the
